trans-unit.source: Provides methods used to render a scroll bar control with visual styles.
This class cannot be inherited.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer> class provides a set of `static` methods that can be used to render a scroll bar control with the current visual style of the operating system.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer> classe fornece um conjunto de `static` métodos que podem ser usados para renderizar um controle de barra de rolagem com o estilo visual atual do sistema operacional.

trans-unit.source: Rendering a control refers to drawing the user interface of a control.
trans-unit.target: Renderizar um controle refere-se a desenhar a interface do usuário de um controle.

trans-unit.source: This is useful if you are drawing a custom control that should have the appearance of the current visual style.
trans-unit.target: Isso é útil se você estiver desenhando um controle personalizado que deve ter a aparência do estilo visual atual.

trans-unit.source: To draw a scroll bar, use a combination of the methods in this class to render each part of the scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: Para desenhar uma barra de rolagem, use uma combinação dos métodos dessa classe para processar cada parte da barra de rolagem.

trans-unit.source: If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the client area of application windows, the methods of this class will draw the scroll bar with the current visual style.
trans-unit.target: Se esses estilos estejam habilitados no sistema operacional e estilos visuais são aplicados à área de cliente do aplicativo windows, os métodos dessa classe desenhará a barra de rolagem com o estilo visual atual.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the methods of this class will throw an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, os métodos dessa classe lançará um <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.

trans-unit.source: To determine whether the members of this class can be used, you can check the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer.IsSupported%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar se os membros dessa classe podem ser usados, você pode verificar o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer.IsSupported%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: This class wraps the functionality of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer?displayProperty=nameWithType> that is set to one of the elements exposed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar?displayProperty=nameWithType> class.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe encapsula a funcionalidade de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer?displayProperty=nameWithType> está definido como um dos elementos expostos pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar?displayProperty=nameWithType> classe.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [renderização de controles com estilos visuais](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md).

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom control that uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer> methods to draw a scroll bar that responds to mouse clicks.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como criar um controle personalizado que usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer> métodos para desenhar uma barra de rolagem que responde aos cliques do mouse.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> used to draw the scroll arrow.
The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that specifies the bounds of the scroll arrow.
One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.ScrollBarArrowButtonState" /> values that specifies the visual state of the scroll arrow.
Draws a scroll arrow with visual styles.
Before using this method, you should verify that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer.IsSupported%2A> property returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Antes de usar esse método, você deve verificar se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer.IsSupported%2A> propriedade retorna `true`.

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer.DrawArrowButton%2A> method in a custom control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaint%2A> method to draw a scroll arrow in the state determined by the location of the mouse pointer.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo de código usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer.DrawArrowButton%2A> método em um controle personalizado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaint%2A> método para desenhar uma seta de rolagem em um estado determinado pelo local do ponteiro do mouse.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer> class.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer> classe.

trans-unit.source: The operating system does not support visual styles.
-or-
Visual styles are disabled by the user in the operating system.
-or-
Visual styles are not applied to the client area of application windows.
The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> used to draw the scroll box.
The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that specifies the bounds of the scroll box.
One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.ScrollBarState" /> values that specifies the visual state of the scroll box.
Draws a horizontal scroll box (also known as the thumb) with visual styles.
Before using this method, you should verify that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer.IsSupported%2A> property returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Antes de usar esse método, você deve verificar se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer.IsSupported%2A> propriedade retorna `true`.

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer.DrawHorizontalThumb%2A> method in a custom control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaint%2A> method to draw a scroll box in the state determined by the location of the mouse pointer.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo de código usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer.DrawHorizontalThumb%2A> método em um controle personalizado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaint%2A> método para desenhar uma caixa de rolagem no estado de determinada pelo local do ponteiro do mouse.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer> class.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer> classe.

trans-unit.source: The operating system does not support visual styles.
-or-
Visual styles are disabled by the user in the operating system.
-or-
Visual styles are not applied to the client area of application windows.
The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> used to draw the scroll box grip.
The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that specifies the bounds of the scroll box grip.
One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.ScrollBarState" /> values that specifies the visual state of the scroll box grip.
Draws a grip on a horizontal scroll box (also known as the thumb) with visual styles.
Before using this method, you should verify that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer.IsSupported%2A> property returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Antes de usar esse método, você deve verificar se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer.IsSupported%2A> propriedade retorna `true`.

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer.DrawHorizontalThumbGrip%2A> method in a custom control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaint%2A> method to draw a scroll box grip in the state determined by the location of the mouse pointer.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo de código usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer.DrawHorizontalThumbGrip%2A> método em um controle personalizado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaint%2A> método para desenhar uma alça da caixa de rolagem no estado de determinada pelo local do ponteiro do mouse.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer> class.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer> classe.

The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> used to draw the scroll bar track.
The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that specifies the bounds of the scroll bar track.
One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.ScrollBarState" /> values that specifies the visual state of the scroll bar track.

Before using this method, you should verify that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer.IsSupported%2A> property returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Antes de usar esse método, você deve verificar se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer.IsSupported%2A> propriedade retorna `true`.

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer.DrawLeftHorizontalTrack%2A> method in a custom control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaint%2A> method to draw the left side of a scroll bar track in the pressed state.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo de código usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer.DrawLeftHorizontalTrack%2A> método em um controle personalizado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaint%2A> controlar o método para desenhar o lado esquerdo de uma barra de rolagem no estado pressionado.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer> class.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer> classe.

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer.DrawRightHorizontalTrack%2A> method in a custom control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaint%2A> method to draw the scroll bar track. -or-

-or-
Visual styles are not applied to the client area of application windows.
The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> used to draw the sizing handle.
The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that specifies the bounds of the sizing handle.
One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.ScrollBarSizeBoxState" /> values that specifies the visual state of the sizing handle.
Draws a scroll bar sizing handle with visual styles.
Before using this method, you should verify that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer.IsSupported%2A> property returns `true`.

-or-
Visual styles are disabled by the user in the operating system.
-or-
Visual styles are not applied to the client area of application windows.
The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> this operation will use.
One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.ScrollBarState" /> values that specifies the visual state of the sizing handle.
Returns the size of the sizing handle.
A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that specifies the size of the sizing handle.
The size of the sizing handle is determined by the current visual style of the operating system.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho da alça de dimensionamento é determinado pelo estilo visual atual do sistema operacional.

trans-unit.source: Before using this method, you should verify that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer.IsSupported%2A> property returns `true`.

Returns the size of the scroll box grip.
A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that specifies the size of the scroll box grip.
The size of the scroll box grip is determined by the current visual style of the operating system.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho da alça de caixa de rolagem é determinado pelo estilo visual atual do sistema operacional.

trans-unit.source: Before using this method, you should verify that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer.IsSupported%2A> property returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Antes de usar esse método, você deve verificar se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer.IsSupported%2A> propriedade retorna `true`.

trans-unit.source: The operating system does not support visual styles.
-or-
Visual styles are disabled by the user in the operating system.
-or-
Visual styles are not applied to the client area of application windows.
Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer" /> class can be used to draw a scroll bar with visual styles.
<see langword="true" /> if the user has enabled visual styles in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the client areas of application windows; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o usuário habilitou estilos visuais no sistema operacional e estilos visuais são aplicados para as áreas de cliente do windows do aplicativo. Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: If this property is `false`, the methods of this class will throw an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: Se essa propriedade for `false`, os métodos dessa classe lançará um <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer.IsSupported%2A> property to determine whether to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer> methods.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo de código usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer.IsSupported%2A> propriedade para determinar se deve usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer> métodos.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer> class.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer> classe.
